墄字的基本解释

墄
qī
台阶的梯级：“岭挟楼梯俊，岩牵殿墄斜。”

墄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cè］
［《廣韻》七則切，入德，清。］
(1)台阶。
(2)垒砌。

墄字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　墄； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页237第18
【廣韻】【韻會】倉則切【集韻】七則切，?音戚。【李善曰】限也。謂階齒也。【三輔黃圖】未央前殿，左墄右平。【註】殿階九級，中分左右。左有齒，人行之，右則平之。

墄字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
墄字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Gang
qī
The steps of the steps: "The ridge leads the stairs to be handsome, and the rock leads the hall to be inclined."
Gang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cè］
["Guangyun" seven cuts, into virtue, and Qing. ]
(1) Steps.
(2) Building a base.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　墄; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 237 18
[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Cang Zeqie [Ji Yun] Seven rhyme cuts, sound Qi. 【Li Shan said】Limited too. That is the order of teeth. [Sanfu Yellow Picture] Weiyang front hall, left and right level. [Note] Nine levels of the palace, around the middle. There are teeth on the left, and people walk through them, and on the right they are flat.
